amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-815 to direct the DNI to report on Iran's support for proxy forces in Syria and Lebanon, including Hizballah, and an assessment of the threat posed to Israel and other U.S. regional allies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Schneider.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
